"Mission 1": "ARKS Ship: VR Space (Cuent Castle Ruins) - Mission 4"
"ARKS Ship: VR Space (Corrupt Tunnels) - Interval Area 1"
"ARKS Ship: VR Space (Mothership Shiva) - Interval Area 2"

"This is the third ARKS training program.
The stages are the old Mothership, the
Darker Den, the Subterranean Tunnels
and the ruins of Cuent Castle.
Select a Class Set to use before you
deploy. Note that your equipment will
change based on which you select.
――――――――――――――――――――
Objective: Clear 5 Missions.
※There is no Mission 6 or higher."

"The challenge will begin shortly.
Clear five Missions without
running out of VR Energy."

"This is an intense training exercise
in which you must adapt on the fly.
I wish you all the best!"
